WoopsiUI::GadgetStyle Class Reference

#include <gadgetstyle.h>

Public Attributes

GadgetColours colours
FontBase * font
FontBase * glyphFont

Detailed Description

Class providing the default colours and fonts for all gadgets. This information is copied into the gadgets when they are constructed, so you will need to change these values *before* creating any gadgets if you want those gadgets to use the altered colours. If the font objects are set, Woopsi will use them in preference to the default system fonts.
